channel.title: Hoton on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Hoton on Chaotic Online

item.title: Allmageddon
item.description: In this episode we’ll know the story of Hoton, a Creature that, seeking for an ancient power to protect everything and everyone he loved, ended up losing everything.

item.title: Blight Fight
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Garv, the OverWorld Caretaker in charge of Lake Morn, helping Tom (and Smildon) to heal the Prexxor Chasm from the Blight instead of fighting it by brute-force

item.title: Hotekk's Challenge (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode, Tom wins the seventh battle in the Hotekk Drome, and thus is challenged by the CodeMaster himself

item.title: Hotekk's Challenge (Parte 2)
item.description: In this episode, after winning CodeMaster Hotekk in a very intelligent way, Tom gets very disappointed with his reward… until he and his friends discover that a desert and not very interesting Location is actually much more than it looks (really!)

item.title: Mega Match
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the internal competition between Kaz and Peyton to see who is the best Chaotic player get to a next level… only now it’s up to Tom
